TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectorySearcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 對 Active Directory 執行查詢。

span.span: Performs queries against Active Directory Domain Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用搜尋，並執行查詢使用輕量型目錄存取通訊協定 (LDAP) 的 Active Directory 網域服務階層的物件。Use a object to search and perform queries against an Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy using Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP). LDAP 是唯一系統提供 Active Directory 服務介面 (ADSI) 支援的提供者目錄搜尋。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports directory searching. 系統管理員可以進行、 改變和刪除位於階層中的物件。An administrator can make, alter, and delete objects that are found in the hierarchy. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 System.DirectoryServices](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ffa2f003-3a9a-4e2a-815e-825c8ddd7949)。For more information, see [Using System.DirectoryServices](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ffa2f003-3a9a-4e2a-815e-825c8ddd7949). 當您建立的執行個體，指定您想要擷取，根和選擇性的清單，要擷取的屬性。When you create an instance of , you specify the root you want to retrieve, and an optional list of properties to retrieve. 屬性可讓您設定其他屬性，以執行下列工作：The property enables you to set additional properties to do the following tasks: - 快取在本機電腦上的搜尋結果。Cache the search results on the local computer. 設定屬性設`true`儲存在本機電腦上的目錄資訊。Set the property to `true` to store directory information on the local computer. 對此本機快取並致力於 Active Directory 網域服務更新時，才呼叫方法。Updates are made to this local cache and committed to Active Directory Domain Services only when the method is called. - 指定要搜尋的時間長度使用屬性。Specify the length of time to search, using the property. - 只擷取屬性名稱。Retrieve attribute names only. 設定屬性設`true`來擷取已指派值給屬性的名稱。Set the property to `true` to retrieve only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned. - 執行分頁的搜尋。Perform a paged search. 設定屬性，以指定的分頁搜尋中傳回的物件數目上限。Set the property to specify the maximum number of objects that are returned in a paged search. 如果您不想執行分頁的搜尋，設定屬性為其預設值為零。If you do not want to perform a paged search, set the property to its default of zero. - 使用指定的項目，以傳回此項目，數目上限屬性。Specify the maximum number of entries to return, using the property. 如果您將設定屬性為其預設值為零，伺服器決定預設值是 1000 個項目。If you set the property to its default of zero, the server-determined default is 1000 entries. > [!NOTE] > 如果傳回的項目和時間限制的最大數目超過伺服器設定的限制，伺服器設定會覆寫的元件設定。If the maximum number of returned entries and time limits exceed the limitations that are set on the server, the server settings override the component settings. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 這被假設您有 Active Directory 網域服務的一般知識，才能使用這個類別。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱概觀。For more information, see the overview.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否以非同步方式執行搜尋。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the search is performed asynchronously.

value.span: 如果是非同步搜尋則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the search is asynchronous; otherwise.

member this.AttributeScopeQuery : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要搜尋之辨別名稱屬性的 LDAP 顯示名稱，

span.span: Gets or sets the LDAP display name of the distinguished name attribute to search in.

summary.span: 只有一個屬性可用於這種類型的搜尋。

span.span: Only one attribute can be used for this type of search.

value.span: 針對其執行搜尋之屬性的 LDAP 顯示名稱，如果未設定屬性範圍查詢，則為空字串。

span.span: The LDAP display name of the attribute to perform the search against, or an empty string of no attribute scope query is set.

exception.span: 屬性設為 以外的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheResults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CacheResults : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在用戶端電腦上快取結果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the result is cached on the client computer.

value.span: 如果在用戶端電腦上快取結果則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the result is cached on the client computer; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果搜尋會傳回大型結果集，會更有效率，如果這個屬性設定為搜尋`false`以避免結果集至用戶端電腦的傳輸。If the search returns a large result set, the search will be more efficient if this property is set to `false` to avoid the transfer of the result set to the client computer. 如果您這樣做，不過，您將無法列舉結果，兩次，因為物件就會建立新的列舉值物件，每次呼叫時。If you do so, however, you will not be able to enumerate the results twice, because the object creates a new enumerator object each time it is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ClientTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用戶端等待伺服器傳回結果的最長時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time that the client waits for the server to return results.

summary.span: 如果在這個時間內伺服器沒有回應，則中止搜尋而且不會傳回任何結果。

span.span: If the server does not respond within this time, the search is aborted and no results are returned.

value.span: 結構，包含用戶端等待伺服器傳回結果的最長時間。

span.span: A structure that contains the maximum amount of time for the client to wait for the server to return results.

value.span: 預設值為 -1 秒，表示永遠等待。

span.span: The default value is -1 second, which means to wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的最小解析為一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小數部分會被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 如果之前用戶端逾時，伺服器將其結果傳回用戶端停止等候，便到達。If the is reached before the client times out, the server returns its results and the client stops waiting. 最大伺服器時間限制是 120 秒。The maximum server time limit is 120 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias DerefAlias { System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias value); };
member this.DerefAlias : System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出如何解析搜尋期間找到之物件的別名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the aliases of objects that are found during a search should be resolved.

value.span: 值，指定解除參考別名的行為。

span.span: A value that specifies the behavior in which aliases are dereferenced.

value.span: 這個屬性的預設設定為 。

span.span: The default setting for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ DirectorySynchronization { System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，表示與搜尋搭配使用的目錄同步處理控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the directory synchronization control to use with the search.

value.span: 用於搜尋的 物件。

span.span: The object for the search.

value.span: 如果不應使用目錄同步處理控制項，則為 。

span.span: if the directory synchronization control should not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目錄同步處理控制項，通常稱為 DirSync 控制，是因為先前的狀態已變更的物件用來搜尋 LDAP 控制項。The directory synchronization control, commonly referred to as the DirSync control, is an LDAP control that is used to search for objects that have changed since a previous state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[輪詢變更使用 DirSync 控制項](/windows/desktop/ad/polling-for-changes-using-the-dirsync-control)。For more information, see the topic [Polling for Changes Using the DirSync Control](/windows/desktop/ad/polling-for-changes-using-the-dirsync-control).

span.span: Releases the managed resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

member this.ExtendedDN : System.DirectoryServices.ExtendedDN with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示辨別名稱的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the format of the distinguished names.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示輕量型目錄存取協定 (LDAP) 格式的篩選條件字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) format filter string.

value.span: LDAP 格式的搜尋篩選條件字串，例如，"(objectClass=user)".。

span.span: The search filter string in LDAP format, such as "(objectClass=user)".

value.span: 預設為 "(objectClass=\*)"，表示擷取所有物件。

span.span: The default is "(objectClass=\*)", which retrieves all objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此篩選會使用下列指導方針：The filter uses the following guidelines: 1. 字串必須括在括號中。The string must be enclosed in parentheses. 2. 運算式可以使用關係運算子： <， \<=、 =、 > = 和 >。Expressions can use the relational operators: <, \<=, =, >=, and >. 例如，"(objectClass=user)"。An example is "(objectClass=user)". 另一個範例是"(lastName > = Davis) 」。Another example is "(lastName>=Davis)". 3. 複合運算式，而形成具有前置詞運算子 & 和|。Compound expressions are formed with the prefix operators & and |. 例如，"(&(objectClass=user) (lastName = Davis))"。An example is "(&(objectClass=user)(lastName= Davis))". 另一個範例是"(&(objectClass=printer) (|(building=42)(building=43)))"。Another example is "(&(objectClass=printer)(|(building=42)(building=43)))". 當篩選條件包含 ADS_UTC_TIME 類型的屬性時，其值必須是 yyyymmddhhmmssZ 格式其中 y、 m、 d、 h、 m、 和 s 獨立的年、 月、 日、 小時、 分鐘、 第二個，分別。When the filter contains an attribute of ADS_UTC_TIME type, its value must be of the yyyymmddhhmmssZ format where y, m, d, h, m, and s stand for year, month, day, hour, minute, and second, respectively. 秒 (ss) 值是選擇性的。The seconds (ss) value is optional. 最後一個字母 Z 表示沒有時間差異。The final letter Z means there is no time differential. 在這種格式，「 上午 10:20:00In this format, "10:20:00 A.M. 可能的第 13 1999 」 變成 「 19990513102000Z"。May 13, 1999" becomes "19990513102000Z". 請注意，Active Directory 網域服務會儲存日期和時間與國際標準時間 （格林威治標準時間）。Note that Active Directory Domain Services stores date and time as Coordinated Universal Time (Greenwich Mean Time). 如果您指定的時間，不受時間差異時，就指定時間的 GMT 時間。If you specify a time with no time differential, you are specifying the time in GMT time. 如果您不是國際標準時間時區中，您可以加入這種差異值 （而不是指定 Z） 國際標準時間來指定時間，以根據您的時區。If you are not in the Coordinated Universal Time time zone, you can add a differential value to the Coordinated Universal Time (instead of specifying Z) to specify a time according to your time zone. 差異根據下列： 差異 = 國際標準時間-Local。The differential is based on the following: differential = Coordinated Universal Time- Local. 若要指定差異，請使用下列格式: [+ /-] hhmm yyyymmddhhmmss。To specify a differential, use the following format: yyyymmddhhmmss[+/-]hhmm. 例如，"下午 8:52:58For example, "8:52:58 P.M. 3 月 23，1999"紐西蘭標準時間 （差異為 12 小時） 指定為"19990323205258.0 + 1200 」。March 23, 1999" New Zealand Standard Time (the differential is 12 hours) is specified as "19990323205258.0+1200". 如需有關 LDAP 搜尋的字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 搜尋篩選語法](/windows/desktop/adsi/search-filter-syntax)。For more information about the LDAP search string format, see [Search Filter Syntax](/windows/desktop/adsi/search-filter-syntax).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection FindAll() cil managed

summary.span: 執行搜尋並傳回找到的項目集合。

span.span: Executes the search and returns a collection of the entries that are found.
A object that contains the results of the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於實作限制回收時，類別無法釋放它的所有 unmanaged 資源。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要避免記憶體流失，您必須呼叫方法時不再需要物件。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

span.span: The specified is not a container.

exception.span: 正在使用的提供者不支援搜尋。

span.span: Searching is not supported by the provider that is being used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult FindOne() cil managed

summary.span: 執行搜尋並且只傳回找到的第一個項目。

span.span: Executes the search and returns only the first entry that is found.

returns.span: 物件，包含搜尋期間找到的第一個項目。

span.span: A object that contains the first entry that is found during the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在搜尋期間找到多個項目，則會傳回第一個項目。If more than one entry is found during the search, only the first entry is returned. 如果發現任何項目符合搜尋條件，為 null 參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 會傳回。If no entries are found to match the search criteria, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PageSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示分頁搜尋中的頁面大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the page size in a paged search.

value.span: 分頁搜尋中伺服器可以傳回的最多物件數目。

span.span: The maximum number of objects the server can return in a paged search.

value.span: 預設為零，表示不執行分頁搜尋。

span.span: The default is zero, which means do not do a paged search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器已找到所指定的物件數目之後屬性，它將會停止搜尋並傳回給用戶端的結果。After the server has found the number of objects that are specified by the property, it will stop searching and return the results to the client. 當用戶端要求更多資料時，伺服器會重新啟動的搜尋離開的地方。When the client requests more data, the server will restart the search where it left off.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertiesToLoad As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.StringCollectionEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.StringCollectionEditor, System.Design, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.StringCollectionEditor, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得值，表示搜尋期間要擷取的屬性清單。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the list of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 物件，包含搜尋期間要擷取的屬性集。

span.span: A object that contains the set of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 預設為空的 ，表示擷取所有屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty , which retrieves all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要擷取特定的屬性，將它們加入此集合前開始搜尋。To retrieve specific properties, add them to this collection before you begin the search. 比方說，`searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");`將電話屬性加入要在搜尋中擷取的屬性清單。For example, `searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");` will add the phone property to the list of properties to retrieve in the search. 在搜尋期間一律擷取屬性"ADsPath"。The property "ADsPath" is always retrieved during the search. 在 [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]和舊版作業系統，執行搜尋的帳戶必須是 Administrators 群組的成員來擷取 ntSecurityDescriptor 屬性。On [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and earlier operating systems, the account that performs the search must be a member of the Administrators group to retrieve the ntSecurityDescriptor property. 如果這不是這樣，會傳回 ntSecurityDescriptor 屬性值會`null`。If this is not the case, the property value that is returned for ntSecurityDescriptor will be `null`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NT 安全性描述元](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-ntsecuritydescriptor)文章。For more information, see the [NT-Security-Descriptor](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-ntsecuritydescriptor) article.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PropertyNamesOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PropertyNamesOnly : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出搜尋是否只擷取已經指派值的屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search retrieves only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned.

value.span: 如果搜尋只取得已經指派值的屬性名稱，則為 ，如果搜尋取得所有要求的屬性之名稱和值，則為 。

span.span: if the search obtains only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned; if the search obtains the names and values for all the requested attributes.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption ReferralChasing { System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示如何搜尋參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how referrals are chased.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果根搜尋未指定伺服器的命名內容，或當搜尋結果跨命名內容 （例如，當您的子網域，而搜尋在父系網域） 中，伺服器就會傳送參考訊息給用戶端可以用戶端 忽略或搜尋。If the root search is not specified in the naming context of the server or when the search results cross a naming context (for example, when you have child domains and search in the parent domain), the server sends a referral message to the client that the client can either ignore or chase.

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

span.span: The object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy where the search starts.

value.span: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which security access information for the specified attributes should be returned by the search.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerPageTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ServerPageTimeLimit : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示伺服器應搜尋個別結果頁的最長搜尋時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server should search for an individual page of results.

summary.span: 這與整個搜尋的時間限制不同。

span.span: This is not the same as the time limit for the entire search.

value.span: ，表示伺服器應搜尋結果頁的時間長度。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time the server should search for a page of results.

value.span: 預設值為 -1 秒，表示永遠搜尋。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to search indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的最小解析為一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小數部分會被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 當達到時間限制時，伺服器就會停止搜尋，並傳回點，以及包含有關在哪裡可以繼續搜尋資訊的 cookie 已經累積達的結果。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point, along with a cookie containing the information about where to resume searching. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性只適用於搜尋其中設為不是預設值為-1 的值。This property only applies to searches where is set to a value that is not the default of -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ServerTimeLimit : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 屬性會取得或設定值，表示伺服器花費的最長搜尋時間。

span.span: The property gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server spends searching.

summary.span: 如果達到時間限制，則只會傳回截至該時間點所找到的項目。

span.span: If the time limit is reached, only entries that are found up to that point are returned.

value.span: ，表示伺服器應搜尋的時間長度。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time that the server should search.

value.span: 預設值為 -1 秒，表示使用由伺服器決定之 120 秒的預設值。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to use the server-determined default of 120 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的最小解析為一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒的小數部分會被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 不同於屬性，屬性會指出搜尋的伺服器將會花費的時間總量。Unlike the property, the property indicates the total amount of time that the server will spend on a search. 當達到時間限制時，伺服器就會停止搜尋，並傳回結果已經累積到該點為止。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point. 設定為-1 秒，使用由伺服器決定預設值。Set to -1 second to use the server-determined default. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將設定設為大於伺服器決定預設值是 120 秒的值，會使用由伺服器決定預設值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 120 seconds, the server-determined default is used. 達到伺服器時間限制之後，您無法繼續搜尋，以從停止的地方。After the server time limit is reached, you cannot continue a search from where it left off.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SizeLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SizeLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示伺服器在搜尋中傳回的最多物件數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 伺服器在搜尋中傳回的最多物件數目。

span.span: The maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 預設值為零，表示使用由伺服器決定之預設 1000 個項目的大小限制。

span.span: The default value is zero, which means to use the server-determined default size limit of 1000 entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋的大小限制為止，並傳回結果之後，伺服器會停止累積到該點為止。The server stops searching after the size limit is reached and returns the results accumulated up to that point. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將設定為大於 1000年個項目的伺服器決定預設值，會使用由伺服器決定預設值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 1000 entries, the server-determined default is used.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.
